title: Further Conflicts
description: The hardback is a special signed edition, limited to just 150 copes, each individually numbered and signed by all contributors. Thirteen tales of conflict, desperate strivings, and resolution, as humankind is pitted against the horrific, the deadly, and the unknown, bringing you such things beleaguered army unit fighting a very alien war and mourning one of their own The chilling fate of those crewing a Russian ice submarine in a dystopian world A view inside the powder-keg environment of an alien prison installation The experiences of a war artist in a disturbingly plausible future; A warrior returning from galactic conflict only to face his greatest ever challenge Ridgeway school, whose children mus survive attack by the dreaded Harvesters; A missionary doctor harbouring an alien fugitive against all advice and reason...
author: Ian Whates
